          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hydrogen bond formed when glucose is dissolved in water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffbindung bildete sich, wenn Glukose im 
Wasser aufgelöst wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'obligation d'hydrogène a formé quand le 
glucose est dissous dans l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A ligação do hidrogênio deu forma quando o 
glucose é dissolvido na água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il legame dell'idrogeno ha formato quando il 
glucosio è dissolto in acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο δεσμός υδρογόνου διαμόρφωσε όταν διαλύεται η 
γλυκόζη στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El enlace del hidrógeno formó cuando la glucosa
se disuelve en agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the structure of glucose dissolved in water indicating the hydrogen bond it forms with water molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolving</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glucose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">monosaccharide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solubility</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water soluble</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Struktur der Glukose 
aufgelöst im Wasser, welches die Wasserstoffbindung es Formulare mit 
Wassermolekülen anzeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la structure du glucose 
dissoute dans l'eau indiquant l'obligation d'hydrogène il des formes
avec des molécules d'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a estrutura do glucose 
dissolvida na água que indica a ligação do hidrogênio ele 
formulários com as moléculas de água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la struttura di 
glucosio dissolta in acqua che indica il legame dell'idrogeno esso 
forme con le molecole di acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη δομή της γλυκόζης που 
διαλύεται στο ύδωρ που δείχνει το δεσμό υδρογόνου που 
διαμορφώνει με τα μόρια ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la estructura de la 
glucosa disuelta en el agua que indica el enlace del hidrógeno él 
las formas con las moléculas de agua.</string>
          </description>
